name: Companion Gift - "Playful and Lively"
description: A doll made in the likeness of Hu Tao, faithfully capturing her playful and lively nature. It is a gift from the "Claw Convoy" organization to thank those who adopt animals.\nThree joyful little ones, spreading happiness throughout the day â€” may you and the little ones always be cheerful and enjoy your time together!
